About me

Hello! My name is Guilherme and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in development started back in 2020, when i studied programmable logic controls in a technical course. Since then i have delved more and more into the world of technology, learning a lot about web development with javascript, node, angular and other stuff.
